title: Taken By the Duke
description: "An eye for an eye, a sin for a sin ""The Pleasure Wars, Book 1"Amid all the lies and scandals that fuel Society s gossip mill, one truth has stood House Rothcastle and House Windbury have always hated each other.Lady Ava Windbury prays the feud will someday end, to no avail. One dreadful night, her brother accidentally causes the death of Christian Rothcastle s sister, a tragedy that leaves both men maimed.Consumed by grief, Christian makes a grim decision. He will kidnap Lady Ava so that her family will feel the pain of loss as keenly as he feels the loss of his own sister. But once he has Ava in his clutches, desire takes unexpected hold. Even more surprising, she willingly surrenders to his every sexual whim after haggling over the terms of giving up her virginity.Too late, he realizes she is using her body for peace, not war. But just as their affair of revenges turns into an affair of the heart, the past rears its ugly head to take matters into its own hands This book contains scenes of erotic seduction, sexual revenge and the healing power of love.
author: Jess Michaels
